GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an article object with the corresponding ID

article.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
article.author: butter_bridge

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: increments an article object's votes with the newVote value

article.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
article.author: butter_bridge

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: posts a new comment for the article with article_id

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves a list of comments for the article with article_id

comments.author: butter_bridge
comments.body: This morning, I showered for nine minutes.

PATCH /api/comments/:comment_id.description: increments a comment object's votes with the newVote value

comment.author: butter_bridge
comment.body: Oh, I've got compassion running out of my nose, pal! I'm the Sultan of Sentiment!

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: deletes a comment by its comment_id
